text: a dog’s death. Answer not. I am gone.

text: E’en so thou outrunn’st grace.—Fool, I

text: Will you leave me there?

text: If Timon stay at home.—You three serve

text: three usurers?

              MEN

speaker: APEMANTUS
text: served thief.

speaker: FOOL
text: Are you three usurers’ men?

ALL
               
              THE
               
              MEN
text: Ay, fool.

speaker: FOOL
text: I think no usurer but has a fool to his servant.

speaker: FOOL
text: My mistress is one, and I am her Fool. When men

speaker: FOOL
text: come to borrow of your masters, they approach

speaker: FOOL
text: sadly and go away merry, but they enter my master’s

speaker: FOOL
text: house merrily and go away sadly. The reason

speaker: FOOL
text: of this?

speaker: APEMANTUS
text: thou shalt be no less esteemed.

speaker: FOOL

speaker: FOOL

speaker: FOOL

speaker: FOOL

speaker: FOOL
